name: A LADYMACB29 Quiz | Words in Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using only letters in "LADYMACB", find a 4-letter word for a baby sheep.
questions.explanation:
Lamb.

	An adult male sheep is called a ram, and an adult female sheep is called a ewe.  A baby sheep is called a lamb.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LADYMACB", find a 3-letter word meaning angry.
questions.explanation:
Mad.

	If you are angry, you are said to be mad.  Sometimes people say "cross" or "red" to mean mad.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LADYMACB", find a 3-letter word meaning the opposite of good.
questions.explanation:
Bad.

	If something is not good, it is said to be bad.  A common expression that you might have heard is 'To take the good with the bad'.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LADYMACB", find a 4-letter word meaning relaxed, or quiet and peaceful.
questions.explanation:
Calm.

	If you are relaxed, quiet, and peaceful, you are said to be calm, or serene.  A spa is meant to relax people in a peaceful environment, and it makes them calm.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LADYMACB", find a 4-letter word for a mollusk, which many people eat, perhaps in a chowder.
questions.explanation:
Clam.

	A clam is a type of mollusk, which is a marine animal with two shells that open and close.  Clams are often eaten in a type of soup called a chowder.  The east coast of the United States makes very good clam chowder, because they get their clams fresh.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LADYMACB", find a 3-letter word for a sweet potato.
questions.explanation:
Yam.

	A yam is often called a sweet potato, although yams and sweet potatoes are not the same thing.  Some people use yams to make a side dish by smashing the yams and seasoning them with sugar and cinnamon and sometimes even honey, and then putting marshmallows on top and baking.  It's very delicious.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LADYMACB", find a 4-letter word meaning that someone has no hair.
questions.explanation:
Bald.

	If someone is bald, that means they have no hair on their head.  Many men are bald, and some are more bald than others.  Even women can be bald, though it is much less common than a bald man!

questions.text: Using only letters in "LADYMACB", find a 3-letter word meaning a month of the year.
questions.explanation:
May.

	May is the shortest name for a month.  It's the fifth month of the year, coming after April and before June.  May can also mean used to ask if you are allowed to do something.  For instance, you might say "May I go to the park?"  You could also say "Am I allowed to go to the park?"

questions.text: Using only letters in "LADYMACB", find a 3-letter word meaning to put something down.
questions.explanation:
Lay.

	Lay can mean to put something down, like you lay the pillow on the bed.  Chickens are also known to "lay" eggs.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LADYMACB", find a 3-letter word for a taxi.
questions.explanation:
Cab.

	A taxi cab is often known simply as a taxi, or a cab.  These cabs are most commonly white or yellow and sometimes black.  Cabs take you from one place to the next.  New York City is said to have over 13,000 taxis!
